name: Johnny Dreams Bad
description:
Johnny Dreams Bad Ludum Dare 48 My first Jam!

Full disclosure: This was my first attempt at a game jam. As such the scope of the game you see is less than what I expected (surprise, heh). 

Enjoy the short experience, I look forward to your feedback on the idea of the game. I'm a novice and appreciate all the constructive criticism you can offer.

Thanks! -J
